messages.content: Please give me a profile summary based on my work experience: currently 4 months as Head of HR international school in Germany. Previously 19 years in FERRERO, promoted from Brand manger in HK to Marketing Director Asia and then to Marketing Director for ASIA-EMEA in Luxembourg.  Also worked as marketing manager in Proctor and Gamble for 2 years, Adidas for 3 years.  Degrees: BBA in HK, MBA in UW- Madison. Lived in HK, US,Lux and Germany.

[Your Name] holds a BBA from Hong Kong and an MBA from the University of Wisconsin-Madison. With [Your Name]'s diverse experience, strong leadership skills, and ability to adapt to different cultures and markets, [Your Name] is well-positioned to continue driving business growth and leading high-performing teams in the future."
